about_the_game:
Your dead uncle has left you some cash with hopes you'll finally make something of yourself. One problem, his debts are now yours and some bad dudes are looking to collect. So pay your bills and hit the streets to find some opportunity.

Choose your character and get your fit right. You gotta look good when you are on the move.

There is a whole city out there brimming with life and possibilities, also crime. Be sure to protect what's yours. You'll definitely need to stay sharp and defend your property against the rising tide of retail crime. It's the 90's so use your pager and payphones to stay connected.

Maybe you'll start a pizza place, or a donut shop, perhaps a flower store or a takeout restaurant, or more! Hire the right people and craft your product to entice new customers. Run your business like a model businessman or run it in to the ground and bleed it dry for personal gain. Make protection deals with the local mob or go undercover for the police as an informant.

The town is wide open and ready for action. Fight against local punks and thieves while competing against the big chain stores. Get creative! Don't pay your pest control bill to attract more rats, capture them and release them at a rival store. Rat Sabotage! And so much more!

Run your business your way. Each store has unique missions and challenges from legitimate to, let's say not so much. But the bills don't stop and there is money to be made. Make sure to keep the customers happy and don't let the wheels fall off trying to make it big.

Make sure you protect what's yours! Set up some security cams in your shops in case you need to take the law into your own hands,
detailed_description:
Your dead uncle has left you some cash with hopes you'll finally make something of yourself. One problem, his debts are now yours and some bad dudes are looking to collect. So pay your bills and hit the streets to find some opportunity.

Choose your character and get your fit right. You gotta look good when you are on the move.

There is a whole city out there brimming with life and possibilities, also crime. Be sure to protect what's yours. You'll definitely need to stay sharp and defend your property against the rising tide of retail crime. It's the 90's so use your pager and payphones to stay connected.

Maybe you'll start a pizza place, or a donut shop, perhaps a flower store or a takeout restaurant, or more! Hire the right people and craft your product to entice new customers. Run your business like a model businessman or run it in to the ground and bleed it dry for personal gain. Make protection deals with the local mob or go undercover for the police as an informant.

The town is wide open and ready for action. Fight against local punks and thieves while competing against the big chain stores. Get creative! Don't pay your pest control bill to attract more rats, capture them and release them at a rival store. Rat Sabotage! And so much more!

Run your business your way. Each store has unique missions and challenges from legitimate to, let's say not so much. But the bills don't stop and there is money to be made. Make sure to keep the customers happy and don't let the wheels fall off trying to make it big.

Make sure you protect what's yours! Set up some security cams in your shops in case you need to take the law into your own hands,
name: Bad 4 Business

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5-3570 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650/GTX 1050-ti, or AMD RX 470/RX 570, or equivalent performance & VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: TBD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TBD
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: Run a small business in a tough town, with 90's vibes in top down and 3rd person. Protect your cash. Drive and deliver your goods. Discover the needs and wants of your customers then craft some 'hot' new products. Decisions matter, play on the shady side or be the business person of the year.
